item.title: Dragon Hide
item.dc:creator: @_A_mpd [A]mpd
item.description:
@_A_mpd wrote:

[quote=“termz, post:14, topic:278567”][quote author=[A]mpd link=topic=367712.msg2786773#msg2786773 date=1242523282]
I’m not a big fan of this idea, since rangers are powerless when they engage in melee combat (unless of course, they carried a weapon with them ;)).

I’m used to the fact that melee combat dominates RSC

[/quote] what if you coded it were u can range while engaged in a battle[/quote]

Even if that is the case, melee-ers would still own rangers, since melee is much more powerful.

But, if you made ranged attacks more powerful, then it would fuck up the combat system, since you could be teamed on by rangers, and with the increased power of ranged attacks, you would be defeated too easily.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Hide
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“Peter, post:10, topic:278567”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=367712.msg2785874#msg2785874 date=1242495510]

Lets turn RSC into RS2. Its bad enough seeing these fail servers with full drag thinking “its leet”.

Runescape classic and runescape 2 are the same game. Except for a huge graphics overhaul and a list of other differences. Range gear was going to be added into runescape classic but then they decided to stop developing (for the graphics overhaul) also they stopped developing some of the skills that are in runescape 2 today. Runescape classic and runescape 2 are they same game.

GodAndJesus
Did you happen to make chaps as well? or vamps?
Also did you make it a drop from dragons?
Do u have blue red and black as well?
[/quote]

No-one is claiming they’re two different games, just most of the RSC players don’t like a lot of RS2 updates.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Hide

item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

Ahh, Peter that sucks DarkQuest is dead…

Sounds like a good idea. I remember on a couple servers… I think on Xtreme PK (the one by Snipar X And Adu) that they were thinking of making boots\hats or something like the ones on RS2, Robin Hood shit.

I wouldn’t mind seeing this implemented on some servers that can do it right.

-Kozy
